member.name: M:CxfDemo.IOraclePermissionGeneratorWebServiceAPI.AddUser(System.String)
member.summary: Adds a user into the data layer.
member.param: A unique identifier for the user.

member.summary: Returns a list of all defined Oracle objects.

member.name: M:CxfDemo.IOraclePermissionGeneratorWebServiceAPI.ConvertToUpperCase(System.String)
member.summary: Converts a string to upper case.
member.remarks: This simple method is included to provide and example of a web method accepting and returning primitive types.
member.returns: The string converted to upper case.
